Our business defines customer lifetime value (CLV) as the total revenue generated by a customer over their entire relationship with our company. This is stored in the customers table under the lifetime_value column.
The products table contains all items available for purchase. The in_stock field is a boolean that indicates whether the product is currently available.
Orders have several possible status values: 'pending', 'processing', 'shipped', 'delivered', and 'cancelled'. These are stored as strings in the status column of the orders table.
Categories can have a hierarchical structure. The parent_id field in the categories table references another category, allowing for nested category structures.
The order_items table represents the many-to-many relationship between orders and products, with additional information about quantity and price at the time of purchase.
